body: This artist CAN draw, I keep reminding myself. But what he seems to love drawing is hot women with mentally retarded men who have kissing fetishes. I can't figure it out for the life of me. Even when he did the Overlord doijin, he picks the most skeevy, unwashed character who isn't even alive anymore, for Albedo and Shalltear to be mind controlled and impregnated by. He just LOVES creeps. And I'm 90% sure he's a troll.
